system.description: You are on fire and a little out of control.  Start a counter at your Tier level (which by the time you are at Mastery, will be a d8 or d10).  While that counter is in effect:o	+6 on all Control rollso	You cannot make Analyze or Infiltration rollso	+d6 on all damage effects

While that counter is in effect:o	+6 on all Control rollso	You cannot make Analyze or Infiltration rollso	+d6 on all damage effects
